name: Pexgeon
description:
Pexgeon is a episodic, story based, simplistic adventure platformer. The game progressively changes over time with new maps, gauntlets, and story based events. Pexgeon is planned to release on December 20th as a full game and will be available on Pc, Mac, and Linux.

A knight and his struggles to save his queen. As the dark lord creeps over the princess' kingdom with hordes of demons. How will your hero overcome such darkness?

As a note from the developer: "Trying something new this year. Based on user review, plays, etc. plan to introduce more episodic to enhance the story further. More puzzles, bosses, upgrades, and adventures to save the princess.

Game does support game controllers but not 100% tested. It should 'work' but movement isn't fully tested with controllers."
